name: Skin Barrier+ Pore Refining Refillable Gel Cream with Niacinamide
about: What it is: One step to hydrate, control shine, refine the look of pores, and repair the skin barrier, specifically formulated for oily and combination skin...Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Uneven Texture, and Oiliness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented* B-L3 Complex: Biomimetic compound delivers lasting repair to skinu2019s moisture barrier.- Zinc PCA: Helps to reduce excess oil and deliver long-term hydration.- Niacinamide: Refines the appearance of pores and visibly brightens + evens skin tone..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: A barrier cream that gels with oily skin to refine the look of pores and reduce excess oil + shine, while instantly repairing skinu2019s moisture barrier and delivering 72 hours of hydration. Non-comedogenic, silicone-free and fragrance-free, this lightweight gel cream is specifically formulated for oily and combination skin to look healthy, hydrated, and glowing - never greasy...Clinical Results:.91% saw improvement in pore refinement*.97% saw a visible reduction in excess oil + shine*.100% had an immediate improvement in skinu2019s moisture barrier.**..*Results of a 7 day clinical trial on 32 subjects using a corneometer..**Results of a 7 day consumer perception study with 32 subjects...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -3.75% Patented* B-L3 Barrier Lipid Complex: Replenishes natural lipids to repair skins moisture barrier in as little as one hour..-1.84% Saccharide Isomerate: Soothes and supports the skin barrier to deliver long-term hydration..-2% Niacinamide: Evens the look of skin tone, absorbs excess oil, and refines the appearance of pore size...*Patent pending..Water/Eau/Aqua, Squalane, Propanediol, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Triheptanoin, Niacinamide, Saccharide Isomerate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Squalene, Zinc Pca, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Seed Extract, Allantoin, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Phytosterols, Acetyl Glutamine, Lecithin, Caprylyl Glycol, Amylopectin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Folic Acid, Oligopeptide-3, Bacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Oligopeptide-1, Oligopeptide-2, Hexapeptide-11, Tocopherol, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Lactic Acid, Glucose, Acetyl Heptapeptide-4, C14-22 Alcohols, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to face and neck after cleansing, both morning and night..-Apply to clean, dry skin....Refill Pod:.-Unscrew lid from empty jar..-Open refill pod..-Remove foil seal..-Twist onto pump..-Ensure there is a tight seal between refill pod and pump..-If pod is difficult to connect, check that the piston (round plastic disc) is not stuck to the lid from your last empty jar..-Place refill in base jar..-Screw pump onto base and prime for use..-Enjoy....Recycling Instructions:.-This is a refillable jar, so the best option is to keep the pump, cap, and outer jar and purchase the refill pod..-If you are disposing of the jar, remove the pump and cap and bring to a Pact Collective bin at Sephora..-Place the outer jar into the recycling bin..-Rinse the inner cup with soapy water and place in a recycling bin..-All of Skinfix's boxes are made from Forest Stewardship Counsel-certified, 100 percent recycled paper using vegetable-based inks..-Place in a recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me YEARS to find something my skin loves. I believe I tested most of all moisturizers available at Sephora, and drugstores that are made for sensitive skin and this one is the FIRST one I repurchased. I love how it feels light on my skin but itu2019s so nourishing, I donu2019t feel sticky, greasy, nor dry by the end of the day, Iu2019m getting close to none reactions and flares of my usual skin issues, and honestly will keep buying as long as it exists. My face loves it and my skin has been calmer. Canu2019t recommend it enough. I might also buy the cream version to use at night now that itu2019s cold and the heaters make the air dry at home, but honestly just to test it because even this gel one feels enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite moisturizer!! I have oily skin and this makes my skin feel hydrated without feeling heavy. I have struggled with moisturizers that make me breakout and feel so greasy. This is absolutely amazing! A must have!

reviews.review_title: Careful, got cream instead of gel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel has been a STAPLE in my routine for months now. I've repurchased many times and swear by it. However, when I repurchased one for when my gel would run out, inside the GEL box was the cream version. I did the online order and pickup in store option. This has NEVER happened to me before and I am quite disappointed as I prefer the gel formula over the cream. I'll be double and triple checking my boxes from now on.

reviews.review_title: Not for my oily, acne skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne prone skin. My face started breaking out after 2 months off my birth control pill, around the start of my period. I have stuck to the same products for a while now but I figured Iu2019d give this a try to see if it made a difference with my irritated skin and maybe my dark spots. I routinely use benzoyl peroxide gel, clindamycin gel, and differin. Iu2019ve used this moisturizer for a month now and unfortunately it can only be used any time Iu2019m not using any of my actives because it burns pretty badly if I do. It is moisturizing but itu2019s also oily. Definitely not worth the price and I wouldnu2019t buy this again. I probably wonu2019t even finish the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Skinfix Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Cream, and it has truly transformed my skin! As someone whou2019s always on the hunt for skincare that delivers serious hydration without feeling heavy, this cream is an absolute game-changer. The texture is rich but melts into my skin like butter, leaving it soft, supple, and so hydrated all day long.  What I love most is how it strengthens my skin barrieru2014itu2019s packed with lipids and peptides that my skin just drinks up. After consistent use, Iu2019ve noticed my skin looks plumper, smoother, and healthier overall. Itu2019s especially great for days when my skin feels extra dry or irritated; it calms everything down instantly. Plus, it layers beautifully under makeup, which is a huge bonus!  The packaging is also a win! I love the hygienic pump dispenser, and it makes getting the perfect amount so easy and mess-free. If youu2019re looking for a powerhouse moisturizer that gives you deep hydration and lasting results, I canu2019t recommend this enough! Itu2019s become a staple in my routine and is worth every penny!

reviews.review_text: This gel cream is nothing special. Overpriced for the performance. Also, it smells terrible. Huge waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me first start by stating that I have used a few skin fix products in the past. I have enjoyed their products, but the skin fix barrier surpassed them all. First off, I loved the packaging and the 1.7 ounces of product you recieve. Now letu2019s talk about the product itself.      I used an exfoliating product that I donu2019t normally use earlier in the month and it destroyed my skin barrier. It caused redness, irritation, and my skin to breakout. Well, I was hesitant at first, but I applied the skin fix barrier on my face morning and night. It was so light weight. It applied so smooth and silky. It calmed the redness, didnu2019t clog my pores, and the peptides repaired my skin barrier absolutely beautifully! My skin felt so hydrated every morning when I woke up. Also, it wore beautifully under my makeup! I will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried over fifty different gel moisturizers- they either leave me greasy, aren't hydrating enough, or contain irritants like fragrance. This gel cream is absolute perfection! I can wear it all day without feeling oily and it never breaks me out. I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thoroughly impressed with the Skinfix Skin Barrier + Pore Refining Gel Cream! This game-changing moisturizer has exceeded my expectations. Despite being incredibly creamy, it's surprisingly light and non-greasy, making it perfect for daily use, especially in the summer when I can get a little greasier.  What truly sets it apart, however, is its remarkable ability to repair and strengthen my skin's barrier function. After consistent use, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's resilience and texture.   The gel cream's unique blend of ingredients works wonders in refining pores, reducing their appearance, and leaving my skin with a healthy, even tone. I've also noticed a decrease in irritation and inflammation, thanks to its soothing and calming properties.  Overall, I'm thoroughly enjoying this gel cream and highly recommend it to anyone seeking a creamy yet lightweight moisturizer that delivers on its promises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited at the opportunity to try the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. I've grown to absolutely love the Skinfix brand! It's refillable, so that cuts down on waste. I love the way that it dispenses. You just press on the top and a small bit comes out. That makes it very convenient and easy to use. It's a very lightweight formula. It absorbs quickly. My skin absolutely loves Skinfix. It's so soothing, also. Like giving your skin a much needed drink of water, but with lots of good stuff in that water.  I can tend to breakout with a lot skincare products but Skinfix never does it. This in particular is even formulated for people with oily and breakout prone skin. I'm beyond grateful to have been able to try Skinfix. Nothing else was helping and most things were making the issues worse, but irritating and clogging my pores. Skinfix has actually helped my hormonal acne. Along with, my skin feels amazing! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/Oily skin with huge pores. My skin gets so oily throughout the day, especially in my T Zone. I use the gel moisturizer during the day after my other skincare products but before Sunscreen. This product is lightweight weight, absorbs very well without being sticky or greasy & does help with oil control. I swear my pores look smaller as well. This moisturizer is absolutely amazing & a little goes a long way, one pump. Another thing I live about this moisturizer is it works very well with my makeup. I usually foundation, concealer, & blush after my skincare routine. This moisturizer didnu2019t peel or cause my makeup to slide. Iu2019m obsessed with this product from skinfix. Love that it soothes & fragrance free. This will definitely be a staple in my skincare routine! Gifted by Skinfix for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lightweight gel cream is a perfect blend of hydration and refinement, making it ideal for those seeking to improve their skin's texture while maintaining a healthy barrier. The inclusion of niacinamide works wonders in minimizing the appearance of pores and evening out skin tone, all without stripping the skin of its natural moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much. Calms my irritated acne skin and keeps my hydrated all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Skinfu00ecx Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream in place of my of my regular day and night moisturizer for about two weeks now. It's now a staple in my skincare routine. It hydrates my dry skin, refines the look of my large pores, improves my skin texture and repairs my skin barrier- all in one. My skin looks and feels healthier and my fines lines and large pores are less noticeable. My skin is smooth and supple. The gel cream texture is light-weight but does the job of deeply hydrating my dehydrated skin without leaving a greasy feel or apperance. One thing I really love is the fact it's also non-comedogenic so it's safe for my blemish-prone skin. I personally have had a hard time finding a good moisturizer that doesn't cause any blemishes while deeply hydrating my dry skin. You only need 1-2 pumps and it easily spreads and absorbs into your skin quickly. It's my favorite moisturizer to apply before doing my usual makeup routine.  It is also , silicone-free and fragrance-free, vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love skinfix skin barrier restoring gel cream. This gel cream is lightweight and quick -absorbing & gives intense hydration. I have acne prone skin & struggle with finding perfect moisturizer for my skin. This moisturizer is great for acne prone skin . Skinfix skin barrier restoring gel cream is lightweight and great. I am using this cream now my skin feels better. I noticed improvement in my skin. Itu2019s help repair my skin barrier. This cream makes my skin hydrating, glowy & plump . My dehydrate skin loves this cream.This is wonder for dry, sensitive skin. It also absorbs so quickly. I recommend this skinfix skin barrier restoring gel cream to everyone who have dry, sensitive and acne prone skin. I love this amazing cream. It doesnu2019t feels heavy in skin & makes my skin hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I was very excited to receive this product because the brand is cruelty free and does not test its products on animals.  I am a fifty-one years young beauty enthusiast. I have mature acne-prone combination skin with an oily T-zone, fine lines, wrinkles, large pores, and acne scars.   I have been using Skinfu00ecx Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream instead of my regular day and night moisturizers for two weeks. I have continued to use my regular day and night serums. My skin looks and feels healthier. My fines lines, wrinkles, and large pores are less noticeable. My acne blemishes have been healing faster. My acne scars have been fading.   I like that the product is fragrance free and does not contain benzoyl peroxide, polysorbates, parabens, sulfates, formaldehydes, phthalates,  silicone, propylene  glycol,  PEGs, or gluten. I like that this product contains sacchaide isomerate, vegan squalane, and healing niacinamide.   I like the convenient hygienic pump. A single pump of the product is enough for my face. I love that this product is lightweight like a serum, quickly absorbs into my skin, and does not leave my combination skin feeling or looking oily. My foundation and concealer have been easier to apply since using this product.  I like that the packaging is sustainable.   As an ethically-conscious beauty enthusiast, I highly recommend this product, especially if you have oily acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found it to be lightweight and easy to apply, absorbing quickly into the skin without leaving a greasy residue. It provides a moderate level of moisture, making my skin feel comfortable and slightly more supple.  However, while the product promises to restore the skin barrier, I didnu2019t notice any significant improvements in my skinu2019s overall texture or resilience. Itu2019s a good option for maintaining basic hydration, but it didnu2019t stand out in terms of providing any noticeable, transformative benefits.  The fragrance-free formula is a plus for those with sensitive skin, and the packaging is hygienic and convenient to use. Overall, Skinfix Barrier+ Restoring Gel Cream is a decent moisturizer for everyday use, but it may not deliver the dramatic results some users might be looking for. Itu2019s a solid, no-frills option for basic skin hydration and barrier support.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skincare enthusiast, Skinfix's Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream has quickly become one of my favorite products. The pump dispenser gives the perfect amount of product with a simple push. I use it daily after cleansing my face. The gel-cream goes on super smoothly, absorbing right into skin without leaving my face looking oily or causing breakouts (as other products do) It's remarkably lightweight yet incredibly hydrating.   Within a week, I noticed significant improvements to my combination skin. The once noticable pores around my cheeks and nose now appeared smaller and less noticeable..Dry spots on my cheeks feel hydrated and my normally oily forehead remains shine free throughout my day. My overall complexion appears brighter and healthier I have even received compliments on my skin which never happened before.  I honestly can't recommend Skinfix Barrier Restoring Gel Cream enough to all those struggling to find the right moisturizer with combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Skin Barrier+ Pore Refining Refillable Gel Cream with Niacinamide has been a wonderful addition to my skincare routine. The lightweight gel cream feels incredibly soothing and has significantly improved my skin's texture and appearance. However, the reusable packaging has a notable flaw. The inner container can become loose within the recyclable outer shell, causing product to seep between the pieces. This issue allows air to get in, compromising the effectiveness of the push pump. While the cream itself is fantastic, the packaging design could use some improvement to ensure a seamless and hassle-free experience.

I am a 50u2019s something year old skincare and beauty enthusiast. I am consistently looking for new and innovative skincare products, and while I love a thick moisturizer, I also enjoy a lightweight moisturizer for daily use. I have been using the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream daily. I have been enjoying using it. It has a texture that is very lightweight but effectively moisturizing. It absorbs well, and the nutripeptides are a huge plus for me. I also like that it doesnu2019t have any silicone in it. I did notice a slight reduction in my pores, so that was a great benefit as well. This moisturizer would be great for anyone who is looking for a daily anti aging moisturizer. I would also recommend it for anyone who has oily or acne prone skin.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SkinFix done did it again with this Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. My skin was a bit dehydrated but when I tell you this is a THIRST QUENCHER?! I ainu2019t lying. I know my picture shows me looking a little haggard but you go on ahead waking up at 5 in the morning to lift weights and turn around and do some cardio and tell me what you would look like too. My skin is normal to dry and this left it hydrated all day. Itu2019s a mewd, itu2019s a game changer, and with the packaging and clean ingredientsu2026Iu2019mma keep this in my skincare rotation for a LONG TIME.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix has a new + improved formula of their barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream and what a phenomenal product to reach for during summer. Firstly, the packaging is amazing; it comes in an airless pump jar and the pump dispenses the perfect amount of product. The gel cream texture of this moisturizer is such a nice hybrid consistency. It's lightweight and easy to spread like a gel without any of the accompanying stickiness. Skinfix loaded this product with powerhouse ingredients like their patented B-L3 complex (to replenish lipids), saccharide isomerate (to strengthen the skin barrier), niacinamide (to even tone and texture, refine pores, and control oil), heptapeptide blend (to support the skin barrier), and zinc PCA (to absorb excess sebum and reduce redness). I really love this especially for daytime because it's hydrating enough for my combination skin type without being too heavy during this exceptionally humid and hot summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a 37 year old with normal to dry acne prone skin, I really enjoyed incorporating the Skinfix Barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream into my summertime daily skin care routine. This product has a true gel-cream consistency that feels extremely lightweight and absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling on the skin. It contains some amazing skin loving and nourishing ingredients such as squalane, hyaluronic acid, and many different peptides. It also contains lactic acid which is great for helping to exfoliate the dead skin cells but also keeping hydration in the skin. Some of the other ingredients like niacinamide and zinc PCA are known to reduce redness, brighten, and even out the overall skin tone. After using this moisturizer for a couple of weeks Iu2019ve noticed a great improvement in my skin tone, texture, and hydration level. Itu2019s a great product for combination, oily, and/or acne prone skin types looking for a lightweight moisturizer thatu2019ll help restore and strengthen your skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the last month, I've been applying a retinol cream that unfortunately caused my skin to become irritated and resulted in a burning feeling each time I used it. I believe the retinol concentration was too high, and it was my initial experience with retinol. This led to my skin's protective barrier being completely stripped. To address this issue, I switched to the Skinfix Barrier+ Skin Barrier Niacinamide Restoring Gel Cream, and it has been beneficial for my skin. I no longer experience the discomfort I felt with other products. The gel appears to be more viscous than typical gel moisturizers, yet it remains lightweight. It offers moisturization without making my skin feel oily, and it doesn't leave a residue on my face, which is why I prefer using it at night. Often, I worry that my moisturizer will come off and transfer to my pillow. My skin is sensitive, and it has remained unaffected or improved since making this change. I haven't seen any new blemishes or flare-ups. It's also free of fragrance. Additionally, I appreciate the design of the packaging; it's very user-friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin barrier regularly takes a beating. As an avid beauty enthusiast, I often try new products and tools but I also spend quite a bit of time outdoors for fitness and gardening. Which means my skin is exposed to the elements and pollutants in the air. This leads to moisture loss, more easily irritated skin, and a dull complexion. So I was extremely excited to see that the Skinfix Skin Barrier+ Pore Refining gel contains Niacinamide. My skin has absolutely been LOVING this product. Some skin barrier products take long term use before you see any benefits but I saw improvement immediately with Skin Barrier+. This gel cream is lightweight and absorbs immediately into my skin. And right away my skin looks brighter and healthier than it has in a long time. It also immediately goes to work on reducing oil production on my combination skin. This makes this product improve my makeup application for a more natural finish. But the best part in the improved texture of my skin after just over a week of use. Even my pores look smaller! I expect it will continue to improve with future use.  Definitely something I will keep in my skin care routine and I canu2019t wait to explore more Skinfix products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Barrier Restoring Gel Cream has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. Its lightweight, gel-like texture glides on effortlessly, instantly hydrating my skin without leaving any greasy residue. I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's overall texture and appearance since I started using it. Infused with nourishing ingredients, this cream effectively soothes and calms dry, irritated skin, making it perfect for sensitive types like mine.   Additionally, the formulation is clean and free of irritating chemicals, which gives me peace of mind. I appreciate that it absorbs quickly, making it ideal for layering under makeup or other treatments. After several weeks of use, my skin feels more resilient and balanced. I highly recommend the Skinfix Barrier Restoring Gel Cream to anyone looking to restore their skinu2019s natural barrieru2014it truly delivers on its promises!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream is perfect for spring and summer, featuring a lightweight, serum-like texture that hydrates without feeling heavy. For nighttime use, I apply it over AHA products to seal in moisture, with one pump sufficient for the entire face. The eco-friendly vacuum pump packaging is both hygienic and refillable. Be care when opening the lid as it can spill out.  Overall, this gel cream offers an effective, lightweight solution for maintaining skin hydration and barrier function during the warmer seasons.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Product! Skinfix has been dominating skinc
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing Product! Skinfix has been dominating skincare and I enjoyed this Skin barrier pore refining gel cream. It was light and unscented. I like how mouth and hydrated my skin felt after a few uses. I like how eco friendly the product is which comes in a refillable container! It's so rare to come by, and how it contains niacinamides and refined the pores, something very beneficial for makeup users out there. I like how versatile this product is and how unique the products are. They don't weigh your skin down and the skin absorbs it immediately once you apply it.Which means it is very hydrating especially for those with combination skin or those looking for a healthier complexion overall.  *Received Product as Part of Promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Skin Barrier+ Pore Refining Refillable Gel Cream with Niacinamide, and it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. This gel cream is a game-changer for anyone looking to refine their pores and strengthen their skin barrier.  Firstly, the inclusion of niacinamide is a major plus. Known for its ability to reduce the appearance of pores, even out skin tone, and improve the skin's barrier function, this ingredient lives up to its reputation. Within just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a visible reduction in the size of my pores and an overall smoother texture.  The gel cream formula is incredibly lightweight and absorbs quickly, making it perfect for both morning and evening routines. It's hydrating without being greasy, which is ideal for my combination skin. I also appreciate that it's refillable, which aligns with my commitment to more sustainable beauty practices.  Another standout feature is how it calms and soothes my skin. I have sensitive skin that can react easily to new products, but this gel cream was gentle and non-irritating. It left my skin feeling soft, balanced, and refreshed after each use.  Overall, the Skin Barrier+ Pore Refining Refillable Gel Cream with Niacinamide is an excellent product that delivers on its promises. reviews.review_title: If your skin canu2019t tolerate moisturizers, try this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have had issues with my skin barrier since I was quite young. My skin is a bit healthier now, but I still deal with very oily, dehydrated skin that gets irritated easily and a pretty weak skin barrier. Iu2019ve tried many, many light moisturizers trying to find ones that are light enough for me to tolerate while still giving the actual benefits of a moisturizer. This is one of the few gel creams that actually provides enough occlusivity to actually be a moisturizer. Most gels or gel creams hydrate the skin but are not at all occlusive - leading to a net LOSS of hydration due to trans epidermal water loss. This one remains so, so light on the skin but still gives a light barrier to keep all the hydration in. The gel cream feels very light on the skin and sinks right in. Iu2019ve found that I do best with 3-4 pumps as my skin really seems to drink this in.  I donu2019t personally love the type of dispenser this product has, but I know this type is very popular right now. I do appreciate that it is well made (not amazing or luxurious, but not at all flimsy) and refillable. This design helps make the product a little less expensive to repurchase and better for the environment.  This is an amazing product in general, but is particularly great if you have a hard time tolerating moisturizer. My skin is a bit more resilient now, but there was a time when putting ANY moisturizer on my face would make my skin burn and turn cherry red. Everything was just too occlusive or irritating. This is the lightest moisturizer that I have ever used that still manages to give you a barrier. If you have trouble tolerating moisturizer and/or have given up finding a moisturizer, please try this one.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is great for those who suffer from dry and acne prone skin and are looking to repair it. This product will help the skin retain back the moisture with niacinamides in it. The product has a gel like texture with a small scent and it glides on smooth to the skin and it feels very lightweight. I highly recommend this product to someone that lives in a dry area or somewhere cold as well. After a couple of weeks of use you will notice improvements on the skins barrier. It also helps with those who are acne prone due to the cool soothing feeling.  The product design is great as far as the bottle may be refillable and you push down to dispense a controlled amount everytime you apply it to your skin. This formula not only helps soothe and repair the skin it also helps to minimize the pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all, I am obsessed with this new Skinfix gel cream! As someone with combo skin who struggles with dry patches and oily T-zones, I've been searching for the holy grail of moisturizers forever. Well, call off the search party because I finally found it with Skinfix's barrier + restoring gel. This lightweight, fast-absorbing cream is a total game changer. Not only does it hydrate without making me greasy, but it actually strengthens my skin barrier, balances oil production, and refines pores. And the ingredients are top-notch - niacinamide, peptides, zinc, the works. As someone who cares about the environment, I appreciate Skinfixu2019s efforts to be an eco-friendly brand. They partnered with Bluebird to complete a full Life Cycle Analysis on the carbon and waste impact of the Barrier+ gel cream.  Skinfix also partnered with RePurpose Global to further reduce their environmental impact. For every pound of plastic used to make the Barrier+ gel cream tubes, Skinfix collects one pound of ocean-bound plastic waste. Itu2019s not often you find a skincare company taking such substantive action on sustainability and environmental protection. Knowing that the Barrier+ gel cream was made through eco-conscious practices and helps support plastic waste collection makes me feel good about using the product and supporting the brand. On top of all of that, I'm happy to report my skin has never looked or felt better. The only downside is having to restrain myself from slathering it on 24/7! Skinfix, you have a customer for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: barrier+ Skin Barrier + Lightweight + Pore-Refining Gel Cream with B-L3 is amazing. I have combination skin so finding a product that works well on my entire face is amazing. It left my dry spots moisturized and my helps absorb excess oil also. My pores feel refined and my face feels moisturized and hydrated. Definitely would recommend for people with combination skin like me who are looking for even skin tone and long lasting hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician based in New York, who loves trying new skin care so I can have the best recommendations for my clients and friends. I am a big fan of this product for multiple reasons. Starting off strong, the packaging. As an esthetician I really appreciate a product where we donu2019t have to put our fingers into a jar and potentially spread bacteria. This product comes with an easy push down tap that dispenses the perfect amount. Secondly, this is really a moisturizer that anyone can use. Of course if you have damage skin barrier, this will be perfect because you wonu2019t be irritating your skin any further, but regardless, if you are more dry or more oily, this is a perfect moisturizer to keep you hydrated. Itu2019s very versatile. It has a very light consistency but leaves you feeling hydrated. It doesnu2019t really have a smell either which I personally prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have flakey skin in between my eyebrows and around my hairline that no amount of exfoliating, aha, glycolic acid, or moisturizer will fix. The only thing thatu2019s semi worked is dandruff shampoo which is also used for fungal acne. This moisturizer has been reformulated and the fungal acne claims have been left out but if you have those issues, I would still try the new formulation because it worked for me!   Usually with moisturizers, my skin will go back to flakey in a few hours but skinfix solved the flakiness and locked in the hydration all day! Iu2019m in my mid 30u2019s so my skin needs help. I was super surprised that a gel could be this light and moisturizing without creating any breakouts. Iu2019ve been using it for two weeks and I feel like I have glass skin instead of shiny skin. Itu2019s non scented and uses a pump to keep the product fresh. I absolutely love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream for the last couple of days and it's a really good quality cream! I tend to stay away from gel creams as they typically dry out my skin or I found that I have to reapply multiple times in the day but this has been consistently hydrating. A little goes a long way when using this gel, The texture is soft, silky, and smooth. I also noticed that it doesn't leave my skin looking greasy. This gel is cool and soothing; I'm excited to see how it fairs this summer! Also, it's fragrance-free which is nice if you are sensitive to scents. I've been using this at night at the end of my skincare routine and pairs really well with my serums. My skin feels super moist in the morning even after having it on all night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Barrier Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream has been really good for my skin. I have been going through some skin issues lately, with eczema/dermatitis flareups so I was a little hesitant to test this out when they arrived. I did gradually start using this cream as a morning moisturizer, and I will admit that I was pleasantly surprised at the outcome in such a short period of time. The cream is a thin, gel consistency and it provides a cooling effect to my skin, which has been quite nice being that it hasbeen irritated. The only reason I am not giving this five stars is because I have only been trying it out for about five days but seeing where my skin was and where it is now I would safely recommend this to others suffering the same issues as me.

reviews.review_title: Fast absorbing gel cream = holy grail u2728
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry and acne-prone skin, you might want to try the SkinFix Barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. This moisturizer helps to restore the skin's natural barrier and regulate sebum production with niacniamide, saccharide isomerate, and heptapeptides. It has a refreshing gel texture that glides smoothly on the skin without any fragrance. My favorite component about this product is its quick absorbing gel texture. It truly feels heavenly when applies and sinks right in. I am more than happy about the plumpness and hydration levels of my skin after using this gel cream. I have already noticed significant improvements in my skin barrier, as it has effectively protected my skin from the cold this winter. As someone with combination skin, this works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty professional for over a decade, Iu2019ve seen many people rave about skincare products over time. Very rarely do I feel like they actually live up to the hype, because theyu2019re not always suitable for a large number of people who try them. Packed with a blend of powerful ingredients like ceramides, peptides, and hyaluronic acid, it works to replenish moisture, lock in hydration, and restore the skin's protective barrier function. Another noteworthy aspect of this gel cream is its compatibility with sensitive skin. As someone who experiences frequent redness and sensitivity, I was relieved to find that this product did not aggravate my skin further. reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast constantly on the hunt for the next holy grail product that caters to my combination skin, the Skin FX Barrier Restoring Gel Cream was a game-changer. This quick absorption made it an excellent base for my makeup, ensuring that my skin remained hydrated without affecting the longevity. I noticed my skin felt more supple and resilient, a testament to its rapid action. Additionally, the 1.84% Saccharide Isomerate and 2% Niacinamide in the formula worked in harmony to soothe my skin, deliver long-term hydration, even out my skin tone, and reduce oiliness and pore appearance. My primary concerns were my visibly large pores, uneven skin texture, and the relentless shininess that emerged throughout the day. This gel-cream addressed each of these issues with surprising efficacy. Within a week of consistent use, my pores appeared less pronounced, and my skin texture had visibly improved, becoming smoother and more refined.

In summary, Skinfixu2019s barrier+ Skin Repair Restoring Gel Cream is best suited for those with oily skin battling acne seeking a simple, gentle moisturizer that leaves skin looking and feeling matte. I would skip if that doesnu2019t describe you. As much I wasnu2019t wowed by this product, I am looking forward to using this when the In terms of performance, it has been helpful for my acne-prone skin. I have noticed this gel cream reduces the redness and inflammation of my active breakouts. My skin wakes up looking calmer and less irritated. reviews.review_text: **Review: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream**  I recently tried the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream, and it has quickly become a favorite in my skincare routine. Infused with a blend of emollients and antioxidants, it helps to replenish lost moisture and protect the skin from environmental stressors.  **Hydration and Comfort:** I've noticed a significant improvement in the hydration levels of my skin since incorporating this gel cream into my routine. It provides long-lasting hydration without feeling heavy or greasy, leaving my skin feeling soft, smooth, and comfortable throughout the day.  **Gentle and Effective:** The formula is gentle and free from common irritants such as fragrance, parabens, and sulfates, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. I haven't experienced any irritation or adverse reactions while using this gel cream, which speaks to its efficacy and skin-friendly ingredients.

reviews.review_text: I have moved from warmer states to the cold parts of the country and my skin has become very dry and the worst part is that by trying a lot of products i also damaged my skin barrier this skin barrier restoring gel cream is more then a moisturizer it not only moisturizes and hydrates your skin but also improves and repairs your skin barrier. my acne prone sensitive skin is very happy with skinfix. the best part about this product is that it comes in a refillable container which is very easy to use and dispense the cream and also very hygienic specially in travelling this container is way easier to carry then those lotion tubes. i love the gel texture of this cream and the way it has controlled the flakiness around my mouth is excellent. i am very happy with this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey everyone! I am a 34 year old beauty enthusiast who has a passion for discovering and trying new products. I typically have oily to combo skin that tends to get overly dry and dehydrated in the cold winter months. Now, let's talk about this beautiful, beneficial cream that comes in the most stunning, refillable airless pump container. It's packed full of powerhouse ingredients such as Saccharide Isomerate and Skinfix's breakthrough patented B-L3 complex that helps restore and replenish the skins natural lipids. Its texture initially looks very thick, but once you start to apply it to the skin, the gel aspect takes effect, and it's surprisingly super lightweight. It absorbs nicely into my skin without leaving a sticky residue behind and has no noticeable scent. In the few weeks I've been using this cream, I've noticed a consistent reduction with the redness of my skin and in the appearance of my enlarged pores and oiliness. It also works very well at balancing and strengthening my skin barrier, helping it to remain strong, healthy, and protected. It works really well under makeup and with other products, but it's not heavy enough on its own to give my skin the moisture it's been lacking in these cold temperatures so in my opinion for my skin this will be the perfect all around summer face cream. Overall, this is a really nice product that delivers so many great nourishing qualities to the skin and its barrier!

reviews.review_title: Skinfix Barrier+ Gel Cream: A Calming Oasis
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a beauty enthusiast with chronically sensitive skin, I'm always on the hunt for calming, effective moisturizers. So, when the Skinfix Barrier+ Gel Cream landed on my vanity, I was eager to test it out. Here's my honest review after a solid four weeks of use:   First Impressions:   The sleek, minimalist packaging and fragrance-free formula immediately won me over. The gel cream itself is lightweight and absorbs quickly, leaving a refreshing, non-greasy feel. Perfect for layering under makeup or wearing alone on warmer days.   Results:  Hydration Hero: This cream definitely delivers on the hydration front. My skin felt noticeably more supple and comfortable, even after long days in dry, winter air. Sensitivity Soother: As someone prone to redness and irritation, I was thrilled to find this cream calming and non-irritating. No flare-ups or breakouts during my testing period! Lightweight Love: This is my go-to moisturizer for daytime wear. It layers well with other products and doesn't leave any heavy residue.  But It's Not All Sunshine and Rainbows:  Not for Everyone: While it worked wonders for my sensitive skin, I wouldn't recommend this for those with oily or acne-prone skin. It might not be mattifying enough for your needs. Pricey Potion: Let's be honest, this cream doesn't come cheap. While the quality is good, the price tag might be a turnoff for some. Pump Woes: My biggest gripe is with the pump dispenser. It sometimes gets clogged and dispenses uneven amounts of product. Not a deal-breaker, but definitely a minor annoyance.  Overall:   If you're looking for a lightweight, hydrating moisturizer that's gentle enough for sensitive skin, the Skinfix Barrier+ Gel Cream is definitely worth trying. Just be aware of the price tag and consider your skin type before taking the plunge.   Honest Star Rating: 4 out of 5 stars (Would be a solid 5 if it were more affordable and had a better pump!)

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my Skin care routine!

reviews.review_title: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, I can't help but rave about Skinfix's Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and for good reason! Let me break it down for you: First off, the texture of this gel cream is divine. It's lightweight yet incredibly hydrating, gliding effortlessly onto the skin with a silky smoothness that's hard to beat. I've got normal to dry skin, and let me tell you, I thought I had my hydration game down until I tried this gem. One of the things I love most about this product is its ability to improve skin barrier function. It locks in moisture, which is a game-changer for anyone who struggles with dryness or dehydration. Whether you're dealing with oily patches, pesky blemishes, or even fungal acne, this gel cream has got you covered. Thanks to its carefully curated blend of ingredients like saccharide isomerate, niacinamide, heptapeptides, and zinc PCA, it helps tackle everything from dryness and flakiness to excess oiliness and shine. And here's the best part: it's formulated to be gentle on even the most sensitive skin. Perfect for layering with your favorite serums, moisturizers, and SPFu2014without any of that dreaded heaviness or greasiness. Whether you're a skincare newbie or a seasoned enthusiast, Skinfix's Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is an absolute must-have. Trust me, your skin will thank you later!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m Carolyn and Iu2019ve been an esthetician for almost thirty years. One of the things I enjoy about my work is learning the genesis of a skincare brand. And I particularly like the history of Skinfix.  In 1850, a compound chemist in Yorkshire, England named Thomas Dixon created a u201cmiracle balmu201d that 162 years later landed in the hands of a beauty-industry veteran who acquired the formula in 2012 when she bought the brand Skinfix from Dixonu2019s great-great-great-granddaughter. I loved the lightweight feel of this formula and its light clean scent. And it contains one of my favorite ingredients niacinamide (vitamin B3). I used this mostly during the day and it's sister Barrier+ product Triple Lipid-Peptide Cream at night. At times, there wasn't enough moisture during the day for me, so I paired it with serums and sometimes I used both Barrier + products layered. My skin feels so much smoother and is holding onto moisture better. I just wish it looked as smooth as it feels. This will be a great hot-weather moisturizer for me in the Nevada summer. And for younger or more oily skin, this would be a great day and night moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix gel  Texture: When opening the Skinfix barrier restoring gel cream, for the first time, I noticed itu2019s a thick cream, but is a little runny, for example, a pudding texture. Skinfix triple barrier peptide cream, instead of the gel, looks like buttercream frosting/whipped cream structure.   Scent: When I was done feeling the texture, I decided to smell the gel cream, to see if there was a scent. I thought my serum, had no fragrance, but the moisturizer, next to it made it have a scent, proving their statement of no added fragrance. In my opinion, I wish more companies did nonfragrance because plenty of people break out due to the skincare product being heavily scented.   Application: The jar, has a great design instead of taking out the moisturizer with your hand or little spoon, you press down, to get the product out. In my opinion, it is a perfect idea, because it gives you the amount you are supposed to use on your face and not overuse the product, and less messy.   Skin type: I have combination skin, which tends more to the oily side. If you have skin type like mean, this is perfect for you. I say this because when it goes on the skin, it gives it a light cooling feel, and dissolves quickly into the skin, without sitting on top of the skin. I use the gel moisturizer, I use instead, of the skin fix gel in the morning since that one is a lighter formula and more water-based feeling on the face. That is my preference, you donu2019t have to use the gel, only in the morning you can also use it at nighttime. I mentioned this because I know some people if their skin, especially on their face gets oily fast, would want a lightweight formula. I know for me if it is hot outside and if the skincare/sunscreen is a heavy formula it will make you feel more uncomfortable throughout the day, that you would just want to wash it off.

As a graduate student, I am under a lot of pressure and stress on a daily basis (not to mention lots of exposure to computer screens); as such, my skin was beginning to get dull, uneven, lose elasticity, and I was getting fine lines on my forehead and around my mouth. My face was losing the definition that I had such pride in. I noticed that my cheekbones looked higher, and when I touched my cheeks they felt bouncy and softu2014but they also had a toned firmness that I had tried to obtain using a gua stone and the Ponds moisturizing cream. Around my forehead, my skin was soft and firm; in fact, today as I was applying the gel cream, I noticed that already the fine lines are beginning to fade and my skin looks so young and has a deep, lush glow that I had lost when I was in my early twenties.   The SkinFix barrier+ Skin Barrier + Lightweight + Pore-Refining Refillable Gel Cream with B-L3 is scentless, and feels like smooth silk when you apply it to your skin; it melts into your pores effortlessly and does not leave your skin feeling heavy. I will probably use this more in the summer and spring then currently in the winter unless I have a breakout.
