reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After being in the beauty industry for over 20 years as a licensed cosmetologist, esthetician and professional makeup artist I've tried thousands of moisturizers! Even as a teen before becoming educated on skincare I religiously used a moisturizer prior to makeup application.. First I'll say I love the skinfix packaging here, I find it more convenient but also cleaner then using a spatula or even worse fingers in a jar.. This dispenses the perfect amount right to you for applying. It feels really amazing when applying, thus gives a cool and soothing gel feel that isn't heavy or greasy at all. It absorbs really quickly without a heavy tacky feeling and still allows makeup application immediately after. This formula is a bit lighter then their traditional being non-comedogenic and non acnegenic but still pumps up dehydrated skin immediately giving you visible results right away. You can really watch it work it's magic on your skin barrier. It pumps up the skin and really soothes it at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a late twenties corporate office worker in the technology industry who works in the office full time. I barely have time in the morning for a complicated makeup or skincare routine, so I love when products can simplify my routine! I didnu2019t expect to love this cream so much, but I do! Itu2019s super lightweight and doesnu2019t leave a heavy or sticky feeling. I love to use this in the morning and let it sit for a few minutes before applying makeup. It acts as the perfect moisturizer and primer, so you can completely skip the primer step in your makeup routine! I noticed it helps with eliminating dry skin flakes also! I love the push to dispense packaging; itu2019s so hygienic and easy to control how much product comes out. I highly recommend this cream!

reviews.review_title: Lightweight Gel Cream Better for Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out Skinfixu2019s Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream, I am very on the fence about it. I think it is probably really great for people with oily or acne-prone skin who canu2019t do thicker creams, but for me and my dry skin, it was not hydrating enough. While I do prefer a somewhat lighter cream for daytime use, this cream is extremely lightweight and absorbed super quickly into my skin. It feels like a big glass of water on my skin initially, but I did not find that the hydrated or silky, soft feeling lasted after being absorbed. I ended up following up this cream with a face oil or some other hydrating product. Given that, I definitely would not use this product at night personally. However, I do like that this cream has no fragrance, and the packaging is very unique with the pump, though it was a little confusing to use at first and I would suggest they put clearer usage instructions on the package.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is my new go-to day moisturizer. For over a week now I have been applying this product daily in my daytime routine because it is a lightweight, gel cream. I do not have oily, acne-prone skin but this restoring gel cream still works amazing on my dry, sensitive skin. It is fast-absorbing and leaves my face feeling super hydrated without a shiny look. I have applied it a few times at night since it absorbs quickly, and I do not have to worry about it coming off on my pillowcase. While I normally prefer a heavier moisturizer at night, this is a product that I will continue to use. I love that it has a refillable option which is slightly cheaper than repurchasing the entire product/jar.  As a beauty expert with over 23 years of experience, I know the importance of protecting my skin barrier. I have been wanting to try Skinfix products for quite some time and I am in love with the two products of theirs that I have tried. The vegan and cruelty-free Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is a soothing, hydrating product that is an absolute must-have product if you want to restore your skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Skinfix lightweight pore refining gel cream. This cream provides the perfect amount of moisture during the day without making my oily skin feel greasy nor tight and dry. I love that it contains niacinimide as that helps with hyperpigmentation and texture. I love that it is fragrance free as fragrance in skincare can irritate my skin. I also love how the product is engineered: it comes with a pump that dispenses the product on the top when you press the top of the container down. That allows for me to mix in my active ingredients before I even apply the gel cream onto my face. This product, unlike many others, fortunately does not break me out. Overall, I love it! If you have oily, acne prone skin and use active ingredients in your routine, this is a great day time cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Now the gel version I really like because at times my skin can get oily throughout the because of the products that I use!! But since Iu2019ve incorporated this in my routine I donu2019t see as much oil pop up!! And itu2019s very lightweight and doesnu2019t have fragrance either!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the lightweight feel of this gel cream. It doesn't feel weird and silicon-y like a lot of facial gels. It melts right into your skin. I noticed a change in my skin pretty quickly. It was a little dull and my coloring was uneven, and after just one week I noticed a huge difference both in skin texture and tone, not to mention my makeup looked way better after using this as my moisturizer. I used this product in conjunction with the SkinFix barrier+ Skin Barrier + Lightweight + Pore-Refining Refillable Gel Cream with B-L3 and I loved both of them so much. The packaging was perfect- I love that the container is refillable, and the information on the box was so informative! I have a lot of different serums and creams and they usually don't say explicitly what to use it for right on the box along with what to use it with. I usually have to look up that information on my own.

reviews.review_title: These will have a cult following in no time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where have these moisturizers been all of my life? Seriously?! I'm a licensed esthetician and very picky with products so that's saying a lot. Even with the knowledge I've accumulated it's really difficult to find a holy grail moisturizer that doesn't have added actives AND that's effective. I have sensitive combination skin and many moisturizers (even supposedly gentle ones) cause it to flare up, clog pores, and make it red/irritated because they have some sort of ingredient that is interacting with my cleanser, etc. I desperately needed a solution in my routine and this is it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is made for those who have oily skin but even though I have dry mature skin I really like the formula for the summer months. It I has the same plumping ability as the creamier version & I did see a difference ion my mature skin immediately after use. This  plumped up the lines around my eyes and mouth. It makes your skin so smooth & it comes in a  refillable container. I love how easily it dispenses from the container giving you the right amount of product. Love all the wonderful ingredients that are so great for the skin. The product feels really refreshing on the skin and is a lightweight gel like consistency. It sinks right  into the skin and feels amazing on the skin.  I also love the fact that it is made to strengthen the skin barrier which is  so important regardless of your age.  Im looking forward to seeing more results as I continue to use this product.  My skin felt so very glowy, hydrated, & radiant after use. My skin felt so hydrated and it lasts throughout the day which is so important for mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive combination skin that leans more on the oily side so my personal preference is always a gel moisturizer. I instantly loved this gel cream. As someone who also sweats easily, products that donu2019t suffocate my skin make for a more enjoyable nighttime skincare routine and this products feels wonderful. Itu2019s a richer consistency than your typical gel but quickly absorbs and hydrates simultaneously. On days when Iu2019m rushing out the door in the morning, I need hydration that lasts but feels comfortable and thatu2019s what this product delivers for me. Iu2019ve recommended it to my mom who has very oily skin and she agrees how beautiful it wears throughout the day and feels on the skin. As a professional makeup artist, this is certainly a product I would use in my kit and recommend to clients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello my name is Michele and Iu2019m a Beauty Expert in my 30u2019s with fair, combination skin. I always love a skincare product that can help heal my skin from within and that can improve my skin barrier functions quickly. This is a new and improved formulation of the Skinfix Barrier + Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream which helps to restore, strengthen, balance and protect your skin barrier. I need this because my skin has been super dry, red and itu2019s been breaking out lately since Iu2019ve been sick with a flu for almost two weeks now. It is formulated with 3.75% of Skinfixu2019s patented B-L3 a barrier lipid complex that helps replenish lipids and helps improve your skin barrier health. This helps your skin restore its own skin barrier. Niacinamide helps even your skin tone and reduces the appearance of pores and supports a balanced skin barrier. I love the beautiful, light blue packaging of this gel cream. It has an easy to use pop up pump that gets just the right amount of gel cream out each time. This pop up feature is much more hygienic than dipping your fingers in a jar. It has packaging that is refillable so you can save the planet one jar at a time. You get a lot of product for your money with 1.7 fluid ounces. Skinfix Gel Cream has a beautiful, lightweight cream to gel texture that absorbs so quickly into my skin. It has a nice natural scent that reminds me of skincare I had used way back in the beginning of my career as a Beauty Expert. Once it dries itu2019s becomes unscented on your skin. My skin feels so smooth and healthy because of this amazing gel cream. You can use this in the morning and at night for optimal skin barrier defense. I use two pumps, one for my face and another one for my neck. This cream has an impressive 12 month shelf life.  This is the perfect product for an emergency skincare intervention. After one hour it will help improve your skin barrier function which is quite remarkable. What a miracle product. It also gives you long lasting hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live on the West Coast and right now itu2019s really cold. I work full-time and itu2019s important to me that my products last throughout the day. Often,  I feel like my skin tends to get dry halfway through the day like my moisturizer stopped working. This gel cream feels very lightweight, but is very hydrating. It does not break me out or cause acne. It works well under sunblock and makeup. It does not feel heavy or greasy at all. It does not pill under other products. I like that you can replace the cream with an insert and reuse the container. It also has a great dispensing system where you push down on the top and just a little bit of the cream comes out. I find it saves product and is very hygienic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This products has been a huge help for my dry skin. I use it morning and night and have noticed my skin is less flaky from dryness and more smooth and hydrated. I also love that it doesnu2019t have a strong smell. Amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a Beauty Enthusiast, I can never have too many skincare products. I love testing skincare products, and I am always eager to get my hands on the newest releases. Skinfix has been a staple in my skincare routine for some time now, consistently ranking among my top five go-to brands.   I love the simple packaging and the convenient airless pump, which dispenses just the right amount of cream with each use. One pump is usually all I need to cover my face, neck, and even decollete. Even though I usually prefer thicker creams for my dry skin, I quite enjoy the lightweight consistency of the Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream and the refreshing sensation on the skin after application. It is packed with good-for-the skin ingredients, including niacinamide and squalene. Not only does the moisturizer absorb quickly, but it also absorbs fully into the skin without leaving behind any unwanted residue. I'm impressed by its performance; although it's lighter than my other moisturizers, it effectively keeps my skin moisturized and hydrated all day long.  Its fragrance-free and essential oil-free formulation makes it an excellent choice for those with sensitive skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a freelance makeup artist for over 10 years and a person who has been obsessing about skincare and makeup, I only use high quality with nutritious ingredients skincare products. I highly recommend Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. This is a Ultra-hydrating Moisturizing gel cream. This cream effectively plumps skin with maximum hydration in 1 hour. It enhances skin luminosity and it doesnu2019t cause any irritations to my skin. The texture of the cream is a light weight gel cream. The cream is fast to be absorbed. It contains powerful hydrating ingredients like saccharide isomerate, niacinamide, heptapeptides and zinc PCA. It is perfect to use on any skin types even on oily acne prone skin. It also provides hydration to the skin. After applying this cream for two weeks I feel my face plumped, hydrated and firmed. As I live in a dry place, Iu2019m happy to add it into my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Using this gel cream by Skinfix has got to be the best thing iu2019ve done for my skin. I use this with the lipid peptide cream (on different days) and my skin is glowing! This is the first time iu2019ve used this product from Skinfix and iu2019m not even surprised by its amazing results. As soon as i apply it, my skins feels so cool, unlike sometimes when i use certain moisturizers i end up feeling a burning sensation. this cream made my skin feel chilly if that makes sense. I wake up the next day with my skin plump and alive. I donu2019t see dull and dry skin anymore, makeup applies easily now, and my face even feels brighter! This is definitely going to be a critical part of my skincare routine and I donu2019t think i will ever replace it. it has the same pump packaging that most skincare companies use now and i love it! A little goes a long way, 1-2 pumps will be perfect for your face and neck. this one is refillable, so that makes it EVEN better. I have absolutely no complaints about this gel cream. Just that the price point is a bit high. BUT. since i only use one pump i feel like it will last a while, and making it refillable is much easier on us too. 20/10!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly wish I had known about this product sooner! Itu2019s fantastic and my favorite of the two I had the pleasure of reviewing (Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream). Unlike the Triple Lipid Face Cream, this product is very versatile. It can be used during the daytime or at night, and most importantly, as a moisturizer for a smooth and clean canvas before applying makeup. The cream initially feels thick, but as you apply it, you can feel the refreshing gel cream take effect. Itu2019s incredibly easy to use; you can simply press down on the pump to dispense the cream, and itu2019s a product that offers refills instead of requiring the purchase of the entire product again. Although this cream is intended for acne-prone skin, my face has been smooth since I started using it, and Iu2019m considering making it my permanent moisturizer for my daily makeup routine. My favorite ingredient found in this gel cream is the usage of niacinamide. This ingredient is what best helps target my skin issues which includes, evening skin tone, absorbing excess oil and refining the appearance of pore size. As a student and worker, Iu2019m constantly on the go and need my makeup to stay intact for long periods of time. My only concern about this cream would have to be the price. Itu2019s pricier than most gel creams but it does wonders to those who are looking for a great versatile gel cream. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream as my day cream. I have dry skin, and it still delivers enough moisture, absorbs well and works great under makeup. Skin feels fresh, plump and calm, and after a few days I noticed that my redness and dry patches reduced as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this moisturizer as its very lightweight and leaves a very nice glow which lasts for hours after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019m actually in love with this product! to this day itu2019s probably one of the best moisturizers iu2019ve ever tried. itu2019s so light and hydrating ud83dude05 iu2019m super picky with my moisturizer and lotions because i hu00e2te u00e0 greasy feel. this doesnu2019t have that! totally worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is refillable and that it really evend my skin out it dries quickly and it doesnu2019t leave a sticky film

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. I have sensitive combination skin, so I have to be careful about what i put on my skin. The regular formula has Shea butter in it which can cause pore clogging. This new formula does not have it, it's great for blemish-prone combination skin. even though it feels really lightweight I feel like I don't have to use a lot to hydrate my skin. This cream has no fragrance, which is amazing because that can also cause breakouts. It's perfect for dehydrated, dry skin. I noticed after a few days of using this gel cream that my dark spots faded a little and my skin felt softer and smoother. I also love the hygenic jar pump. This moisturizer is also really great for wearing under makeup. This is a great gel cream for dehydrated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, I wasn't expecting the reault I got. Usually, I don't gel creams because my face tends to be so dry. This one was different to my skin somehow, and i can't get enough of it. I love the texture. My skin just drinks it in. I don't get any bad reaction or sensitivity from this product. My skin is acne prone sometimes, and I have not had any breakouts so far either. I also love that these are refillable. I have been using different types of products for a few years now, probably about 6 or 7 years ago, I started. I will be a for life customer of Skinfix now. I recommend this to anyone with combination or oily skin who needs a good moisturizer you can use all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so thick and plumping it mad my skin feel pillowy after every use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using skin barrier restoring gel cream in the mornings for over a week now., my skin feels very soft and moisturized.  I love the texture of this cream it feels very nourishing and fresh on the skin.  It also absorbs very well and does not feel heavy on the skin.  It also absorbs very well, doesn't feel heavy on the skin, and is fragrance-free. This  cream integrates very well with sunscreen and makeup..if you wear makeup you will love it and don't forget to apply it on your neck too!  As a reference my skin is oily and has large pores and this cream has not given me pimples. I love the refillable bottle and this is good for the environment, but the bottle is too big and not good to take with you when you travel  I recommend this cream for people who want extra hydration and those who want to keep their skin barrier healthy.

reviews.review_title: A gel consistency for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast living in Arizona. I have very dry, fair skin with some fine-lines and post-acne scaring. I tend to have a lot of facial redness and flaking year-round. In the winter my skin suffers from even more skin tightness and discomfort.   Skinfix barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is a lightweight, deeply hydrating peptide gel cream with 4 clinical additives. It designed to help improve your skin barrier and lock in as little as 1 hour + lock-in hydration for up to 72 hours.   Finally a lightweight gel that performs like a cream! The consistency of the cream doesnu2019t negatively impact how well it works! Because it is a lighter weight product I do prefer to use this in the daytime. It feels calming and refreshing when I am applying it to my face. I feel like itu2019s easier to pair and layer with my other skincare and makeup products. I think that in the hot Arizona summers I will like to use this gel cream as my night cream as well.   I love that it comes in a refillable jar with a hygienic pump-top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has combination skin and has suffered with acne, for as long as I can remember, finding a moisturizer that is specifically designed for skin like mine, is remarkable! Most moisturizers are heavy and leave your skin feeling even more oily than before. I find that my u201cproblem areasu201d for both oil and acne, are my nose and around the base of my face. I have several acne scars and spots where there is a very uneven texture. After using the Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream for over a week, I have noticed a significant difference in the size of my pores, especially on my nose, as well as, a more even skin tone throughout several areas of my face. I would recommend this product to anyone with combination skin or even oily skin, who suffer with acne, and want a moisturizer that will actually show results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream worked really well for my skin, felt very moisturizing and itu2019s really lightweight, made my skin look nice, this product is now a part of my skincare routine, canu2019t go without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hey everyone! Ishika here, still exploring the world of skincare. This time, I've got something perfect for my fellow oily skin galsu2014the Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream.  Packaged simply yet effectively, this gel cream is a breath of fresh air for oily skin. Its lightweight texture absorbs quickly, providing hydration without any greasy residue. Formulated to support the skin's natural barrier, it helps regulate sebum production while soothing irritation.  While it might not offer the intense hydration of heavier creams, its gentle formula is ideal for daytime wear or as a makeup base. If you're after a moisturizer that balances without adding to oiliness, the Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I just have to say the container the product comes in is genius! I absolutely love that there is no mess and no leakage to deal with.  The consistency of the gel cream is similar to any other gel moisturizer but is not super liquid, it holds its form.  The gel is slightly off white in color and seems to blend flawlessly with your skin.  I use as directed on the label daily.  For reference I have combination type skin where itu2019s oily in the summer and dry in the winter.  This cream really helps moisturize my skin so it doesnu2019t dry out.  It also makes my skin seem softer after using it.  I am very happy with it so far, I am excited to see what extended use of this product will do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I have been using the skinfix moisturizers for a few days now. My first impression was I liked the packaging. Not only does it pump out nicely itu2019s also refillable. The gel cream has a nice texture, absorbs quickly, and has no strong fragrances. It doesnu2019t add to my oiliness which is great as I have combo skin. My skin absolutely loves to throw tantrums, is super acne prone, and will scar without even touching a spot! so Iu2019m extremely glad to say this hasnu2019t broke me out. It has calmed my current tantrum. I feel skinfix is unique, and I do like the ingredients. Itu2019s important to me to find quality products with good for your skin benefits. This gel cream has the B-L3 complex (replenishes lipids) , saccharide isomerate (delivers long term hydration to skin barrier), niacinamide (helps even skin tone/smooth texture/absorbs oil/refine pores), heptapeptide blend ( more skin barrier support), and zinc PCA ( absorbs excess sebum/reduces redness)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, my name is Jacquie. I am a freelance makeup artist and beauty content creator of 5+ years. Today I wanted to talk about SkinFixu2019s skin barrier restoring gel cream.  I have found that this gel moisturizer is absolutely amazing for my oily skin. It pairs well under any sunblock, and it doesnu2019t leave my skin greasy. Once applied right after showering it was like my skin had drunk a tall glass of water. I looked like I was glowing and my skin felt more bouncy. This is a cream that wears very well under makeup and falls into the steps properly with your regular skincare routine. I would recommend this moisturizer for daily and nightly use for any of my oily skin girls. Love this perfect addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix has been my absolute favorite because it just helps soothe my dry skin after being outside. Their lightweight formula absorbs quickly into my skin without leaving me feeling greasy throughout the day. And I love how smooth and glowy my skin feels ever since using their skin barrier restoring gel cream.

reviews.review_title: Gentle moisturizing action for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is gentle and fragrance free, so you donu2019t have to worry about irritation. I have such an issue with redness and oil, which this product has been a life changer for. It gently removes oil, minimizes my pores, all without drying my face out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing formula overall. Unlike other gel moisturizes it actually has quite nice weight to the texture and it absorbs into the skin quickly. My skin felt soft, smooth, moisturized overall. I love it has hygienic packaging. I like it has instant result I could notice on my skin, like smoother skin and smaller pore size and skin looked more glowy and brighter. I definitely recommend this cream to any skin type. I have dry skin and worked really well on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with combination skin that typically gets a bit oilier during the day, I struggle with some moisturiziers being too heavy for daytime wear. With that in mind, some gel moisturizers are less heavy, but don't get the job done. Not the case with this Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream! Not only does it have a super fresh gel consistency, it feels lightweight on the skin while providing ample hydration and balancing my skin tone and oil levels. This gel cream feels amazing on the skin, cool and soothing, and sinks into the skin like a dream leaving it soft, hydrated and plump. It is formulated to repair the skin's moisture barrier while delivering long-term hydration. The addition of niacinamide is genius as it aids in absorbing excess oil and minimizing pore appearance. The cream itself has a very light scent and comes packaged in an eco-friendly airless pump container that can be refilled for reduced waste. I absolutely love this kind of packaging and find it not only convenient, but also helping in product usage as it dispenses just the right amount for application. I've only been using for a fairly short time, but I am truly loving how this product feels and even more so, how my skin looks and feels after applying for daytime use. Plump, hydrated, but not greasy or oily, staying moisturized throughout the day, but without feeling oily even with makeup applied and worn all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Anytime a product says it will help reduce oil build up - I am all ears. Skinfix is a no nonsense clean brand that focuses on healing the skin barrier. I have to say I am quite impressed with the formulation. Even though I'm not sure that it actually reduced oil production but my skin looks amazing when I use this product every other day. I know that may sound strange but something about the formulation doesn't quite let my easily clogged pores breathe the way they need to. But I noticed when I add this to my routine after steaming or masking or just a couple times a week I'm very happy with it.   This is a light weight, unscented formula that wears well under makeup. My skin looks hydrated and more even after using it for about a week. This product also come in a refillable jar which I think it pretty useful and the price point $54 gets knocked a few bucks whenever you order a refill so I love that not just for the planet but for my wallet as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely enjoying the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream! It is incredibly lightweight, unscented and gives my skin a lovely glow that lasts for hours. With my very dehydrated skin, I find this moisturizer to be a game-changer as it has significantly brightened, hydrated and reduced the dull appearance of my skin. The texture of the gel is delightful and it absorbs well, leaving my skin feeling hydrated without any greasiness. I can sense that my skin's barrier is being protected, which impresses me greatly. This product will definitely become a staple in my skincare routine, especially during the dry winter months when my skin tends to suffer the most. My skin looks incredible!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a skincare enthusiast that enjoys trying new products and I love this gel cream. My skin is balanced for the most part but can always use some extra hydration and this product delivers. The gel cream is fast absorbing and blends beautifully. A little goes a long way and my skin is instantly soothed. The unique blend of ingredients and patented barrier lipid complex are so nourishing and I'm highly satisfied with the results I'm seeing. I really like the hygienic factor and refillable packaging design. It's free from harmful ingredients and is vegan and cruelty free. I would definitely purchase and recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it is light, my skin was irritated and it has restored my skin barrier and it has no smell at all. I love that it is cruelty-free and friendly to my skin and my health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my very 1st time trying Skinfix product and here is my honest opinion about it. I have combo, acne prone skin.  1st of all, I love that this Skinfix cream doesn't contain most of the toxic, synthetic ingredients & allergens. It does try to make a better product & packaging. I like that it contains no fragrance just scent from whatever ingredients they use. I like the refillable packaging but can we please have the outer jar made with glass? I think it wouldn't be a problem since the main working component is the plastic pump & refillable jar inside of it.  The pump gives me the right amount for each use. The lotion is a slightly thicker gel than i expected. It goes on smooth & gives me a few minutes to massage it in till it completely dries. It soaks really well and it doesn't leave a film on my skin and it is moisturized. My skin feels smooth like there is no product applied. After 1 week of use, I didn't experience any itchy skin or allergic reaction only 2 pimples. I do feel that my skin is moisterized, pumper & soft. So far I only use it at night and it does a good job keeping me hydrated without feeling so oily when I wake up. Maybe i'll switch it to the morning since it's lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am someone who have always struggled with combination skin this is the almost perfect moisturizing gel. The reason why I said almost is because of its smell. It doesnu2019t bother me much but I really wish it was just fragrance free formula completely. But let me tell youu2026 it has helped alot with my dry cheeks, nose and forehead. I have been looking for something that is light but still has moisture. Most creams and gels are super thick and this is not which I absolutely Love. Something that I definitely look for in a skincare is clean ingredients that are silicone free because my skin often breaks out and this skin fix gel moisturizer definitely checks that !! If you're like me defintely give it a try you will be happy with this light gel moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great. I use it day and night and it's perfect for my oily skin!! I have had zero breakouts since using this product and I'm in love with how it absorbs into the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gel cream is utter perfection for my combo oily skin. The texture is so light and yet hydrating, so it leaves my oily spots and dry spots equally balanced. I absolutely love the healthy glow this gives my skin. The push dispenser packaging is perfect for giving me exactly the right amount to cover my face and neck. This has been a welcome product in my winter skin routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream for a week now and I can already see results! Iu2019m a 29 year old who lives in Florida and has combination skin so I can have a hard time finding a moisturizer that is hydrating enough without feeling too heavy in my humid climate. But I think I might have finally found THE one! The gel texture is lightweight but I can see and feel how much more nourished my skin is since I began using it. One of my favorite features of the product is the packaging, which is not only eco-friendly by being refillable, but it also has a pump to dispense the product without having to reach your fingers inside it and risk contamination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying, I really like the packaging. This press-down method prevents cross-contamination. It was hard to open at first but once you get it, you get it. It still allows access to the bulk of the product but I prefer the press down. This floral fragrance is overwhelming though, and can be off-putting to sensitive noses.   This milky texture is amazing. It reminded me of E.L.F.'s Holy Hydration Gel Moisturizer. Even though I have dry skin, I actually prefer this over the Triple-Lipid Peptide Cream. It's very silky with a light sheen finish. It does have a little bounce back to it and can peel so just be cautious of that. It refines texture and plumps the pores for sure. I really like the glow it gives and see myself wearing this. I like that it didn't dry down totally matte but silky instead.  I want to use it as a primer and get back to y'all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I thought I was going to love it. I've heard amazing things about skin fix but unfortunately my cream came with a distinctive smell that was very unpleasing for myself personally. Not only that it did unfortunately caused me to break out and my skin is very sensitive so I think that it is, really amazing for people who don't have issues with certain fragrances and sensitivity on the skin. Unfortunately, that was not my case but I do love the container that it came with. It's very practical and I believe that it could work for other people just personally did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Licensed Esthetician, and I enjoy trying out new skincare products. My skin is dry and is always in need of hydration. I have been using Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream twice a day for about a week, and I am enjoying my experience with Skinfix. My skin is clear, soft, and it calmed my redness. Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is a lightweight gel cream moisturizer. This is good for all skin types. Especially if you are on the oily side, with acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a skincare lover in my late 20s. I am currently a stay at home wife so I devote  a lot of my time to my love of beauty and finding the best new products to try! Skinfix products have quickly become a must have in my daily skincare routine. This Newley formulated barrier restoring gel moisturizer is perfect for my skin prep before makeup application. It is thin and lightweight but still totally hydrating. I was a little nervous that it would not be hydrating enough for me since I have pretty dry skin but boy was I wrong. Plus it has ingredients like niacinamide that really help give an even texture to the skin to help further perfect my base for makeup! It is virtually fragrance free so any skin type and all ages could definitely benefit from this moisturizing gel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream has a lightweight, scentless and slightly colored gel that glides onto your face; penetrating deeply into the skin. The gel leaves your face with a glow effect throughout the day. My face feels very soft after each use. Keep in mind that a little bit goes a long way. Skinfix gel cream has become a daily routine for my skin. It becomes of use in the morning and night. I could feel and see the difference in my face. Underneath my eyes, the puffiness have disappeared along with the dark circles. I feel a sense of relief not to coverup my eyes with sunglasses each day...Thanks to Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. If you prefer a gel that is gentle on skin, that's effective, non- greasy, etc., I recommend this product to you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lightweight Skinfix Barrier+ Skin Restoring Barrier Gel Cream that supports the skin barrier to help improve skin hydration. It contains shine-fighting and microbiome-nourishing ingredients that help absorb excess oil, refine the appearance of pores, and support healthy microbiota.  Skin Restoring Barrier Gel Creams are formulated to enhance and support the skinu2019s natural barrier function. These typically contain ingredients like ceramides, fatty acids, and other lipid-rich components. These creams aim to replenish and strengthen the skin barrier, which is crucial for retaining moisture, preventing dehydration, and protecting against external irritants.The gel texture provides a lightweight and easily absorbed feel, making it suitable for various skin types, including those prone to sensitivity. These creams are particularly beneficial for individuals with compromised or dry skin, helping to restore and maintain a healthy skin barrier.

reviews.review_title: Another Must have in your everyday routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really enjoyed the experience of trying this moisturizer, this one is extremely light weight and super hydrating as well. Similarly, they repair the skins barrier and have similar benefits as the cream version of this product. It felt like the texture was different it was super whippy, and it absorbs super quickly into my skin and what I loved about it is that the hydration stayed on top of my barrier and my skin felt super protected from the environment during the day. This moisturizer can be used by every skin type and skin condition and can also be used day and night. Perfect moisturizer to put on during the hot summer months and well as warm days during the year. As a Professional Esthetician I feel like this is the one moisturizer that will perform quickly and save your clients skin from breaking down, so yes, absolutely it gets my seal of approval and recommendation well done Skin Fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with SkinFix because they make top-notch products that are specifically designed to protect our most delicate organu2014the skin. The SkinFix Restoring Gel Cream is seriously amazing. I saw real, noticeable results after just one use. When I was in cosmetology school, they taught us that taking care of your skin barrier is the ultimate key to having great skin. This product really lives up to its promise of restoring the skin barrier. The winter months has my skin super dry, sometimes red and itchy, and it's in constant need of some extra TLC. With this cold weather wreaking havoc on my skin, this product has been a lifesaver.  When I found out that this product was specifically designed to help restore the skin barrier, I was over the moon to give it a try. And boy, did it exceed my expectations! I've found that my favorite skincare products are usually gel-like in consistency, just like this one. I love how it absorbs into my skin, actually making me feel like it's doing its thing. The pump jar is so convenient and gives me just the right amount for my face and neck with a single pump & the hygienic aspects speak for themselves.  Once I applied it to my face, I immediately felt a refreshing and cooling sensation. It hydrated my skin instantly, giving it the love it desperately needed. It doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy or like I have a ton of product on my face. It's lightweight, but it definitely delivers great results. I've noticed that my skin looks less oily, but at the same time more glowy and healthy. I'm absolutely in love with the ingredients, the fact that it's fragrance-free, and how it makes my skin feel smooth and youthful. This product truly does what it claims. I'm incredibly impressed with its quality, and I can't wait to explore the other amazing products in the SkinFix line. Iu2019d love if this product was available in a body-sized quantity because my dry, itchy winter legs are jealous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Beauty Enthusiast and mother of two from Houston, Texas ! I have been using the SKINFIX- Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream for about a week now. And I truly enjoy using this cream everyday on my skin. It has definitely made my skin smoother and added shine to my skin.   I apply this cream in the morning after throughly washing and cleansing my face. I like the gel+cream like consistency of this product. Its lightweight and quickly absorbs into my skin, leaving no residue or sticky after feeling.   I love the packaging and design of this product. Its thoughtfully designed in a way that prevents too much product from coming out. I gently push down and it dispenses the product. Only two pumps are needed to cover my entire face and neck. And the best part is the cream stays put the entire day. It does not move or budge nor do I have to re apply it throughout the day.   I give this cream a perfect 5 stars and highly recommend to all those who are looking to restore, strengthen, balance + protect the skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been loving my experience with the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream! First off, let's talk about the packaging u2013 it's definitely unique and eye-catching, which is always a plus. Now, onto the formula itself. This gel cream absorbs into my skin like a dream, and I mean right away! I've noticed an instant plumping effect, which is fantastic for giving my skin that healthy, hydrated look.   What I really appreciate is that despite its intense hydration, this gel cream doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy at all. It's super lightweight, which means I can apply my makeup on top without any issues, and it holds up really well throughout the day. Plus, the hydrating properties aren't overpowering u2013 it strikes just the right balance, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and nourished.  Now, let's talk about the ingredients. I'm impressed with the blend of high-quality ingredients in this formula. Skinfix really knows their stuff when it comes to skincare, and it shows. I feel good knowing that I'm treating my skin to effective hydration without any harsh or irritating ingredients.  And can we talk about the refillable aspect? I love that I can easily refill this cream when I run out, reducing waste and helping the environment. It's a win-win!  I can't recommend the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream enough. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and for good reason. If you're looking for a hydrating, lightweight cream that delivers results, this is definitely worth trying out!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for Dry Skin in Spring
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you rotate your products seasonally, or use different day and night creams, please keep reading because this product is surprisingly versatile. I have mature skin (age 57) and my skin ranges from normal to dry depending on the weather. Iu2019ve long preferred gel creams for daytime, but they donu2019t always offer enough hydration for my needs.   At first blush, I thought the Barrier+ Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream wouldnu2019t be a good fit for me, but it provides ample hydration when paired with my usual hyaluronic acid serum. Iu2019ve worn this exclusively during the daytime for over a week, and I havenu2019t felt the urge to mist my skin once. That says a lot for the formula because I live in the SoCal desert and apply this before walking our dog in the chilly, breezy morning air. The texture is thin enough to absorb quickly and thick enough to feel like itu2019s an actual cream instead of a gel.   Iu2019m so happy to recommend this to my friends with combination or oily skin as well as those who want something light for daytime that also plays well with long-wear foundation. No complaints here. 5 stars. And bonus points for the refillable packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised at how well this skincare product helped my dry skin. The formula is amazing! It melts into my skin and leaves me glowing. This is an absolute lifesaver in the winter. I also love the fragrance

reviews.review_title: Light gel cream thatu2019s moisturizing for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s my first time using the Skinfix brand. I loved the packaging as it has a nice light blue color which makes it easy to differentiate this Restoring Gel cream and the Triple Lipid-Peptide cream which is in a deeper blue container. Also love how it is a refillable packaging and that this gel cream comes in a unique sanitary pump! Now speaking about the Restoring Gel cream itself, Iu2019d say that the texture is light and creamy and leaves a glow that lasts all day which is great for my dry skin type. and itu2019s also unscented which is great since I prefer unscented moisturizers. It left my skin feeling very nice, moisturized, and glowy which is everything youu2019d need when trying a lighter gel cream like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d like to start off by saying how I love that theyu2019re are trying to be sustainable and have the option to refill the container. This is not a heavy moisturizer. It feels very nice on the skin and looks great under a full face of make up. I saw some improvement on my redness and my pores appear to look smaller as well. I definitely recommend it! I loved it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive and combination skin type. I also deal with enlarged pores and redness on the face. I have been using Skinfix Barrier + Skin barrier restoring gel cream for almost two weeks now twice in a day in the morning and in night along with my other skincare ritual. Firstly, the texture of this cream is lightweight and it gets absorbed into the skin really quickly and does not feel sticky or oily. Next, I have seen the consistent use has reduced the appearance of enlarged pores on my face and the redness has reduced to an extent as well. It keeps my skin well hydrated and thus, I plan on using it consistently to keep the results coming. With all these benefits one does feel the skin barrier restored. I highly recommend this cream if you want to target these multiple face problems with one product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all of the skincare texture, gel cream must be my top favorite, it has the best of both worlds. As a combination skin type, i prefer something lightweight but still has all of those rich texture for the drier areas like my check and neck skin. This barrier cream is perfect for that. My skin got oily if I donu2019t moisturize it properly and after using this for awhile, I could tell that it definitely helps reduce excessive oil, at the same time blur those huge pores and my skin stay hydrated throughout the day. The cream is super soothing and itu2019s amazing if you keep it in the fridge, instant calming, cooling sensation really wake me up for the day.  Love the packaging, such a fun way to take the product while keeping them fresh at the same time. It has no unnecessary fragrance so I would say itu2019s suitable for all skin types. I highly recommend this for any one whou2019s looking for a simple cream, which could act as a base layer for your makeup and a barrier repair cream at night.

reviews.review_title: My Skin's New BFF - This Gel Cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 20 year old college student, my skin was feeling super dry, tight, and just sad. Constant stress and staring at screens wrecks my skin barrier! I decided to try the Skinfix Barrier Restoring Gel Cream and I'm so glad I did. This featherlight gel is like a tall glass of water for my parched skin. It disappears into my skin smoothly without any grease or residue. After just a few days, the dry patches and flakiness I battled were gone! My skin looks more radiant and feels much softer and smoother. The clinically tested ingredients have given my skin barrier the reboot it desperately needed. I love that it has no pore-clogging silicones that tend to break me out. My skin is more balanced now and the gel cream locks in moisture for the perfect dewy glow. This formula delivers on every claim - it's really strengthened and restored my skin. As a busy student, I need products that multitask and this gel cream definitely does. It's the ultimate BFF for my skin! I can't recommend it enough to students and anyone else with dryness or irritation. It's lightweight but powerful - an absolute skincare superhero.

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating even on dry skin and never pills!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Even though I have dry skin, this gel moisturizer works very well to maintaining a hydrating and smooth base on my face. It doesn't irritate my skin at all or make my dry patches feel even more dry. It's very lightweight and smooth texture has a refreshing feel to it which makes me want to incorporate it into my skincare routine even if it's meant for oily skin. I love the pump on the top as it reducing any waste of product and makes sure that the rest of the moisturizer stays clean. This moisturizer has not caused my makeup to pill once, which is a huge issue for me when trying out new moisturizers, which allows me to finally put on makeup and feel hydrated without feeling like I have to give up one or the other. It has a bit of a scent but nothing too major- this is a good reliable moisturizer I think everyone should try out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With my broad involvement in dermatology and enthusiasm for skincare, I have been utilizing this cream whereas since having a secure laser treatment safe for my skin type. This product has been an advantage for my skin to maintain hydration and alleviating, and it has demonstrated to be non-comedogenic, keeping my pores clear and sound. I exceedingly suggest the Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream as an uncommon post-procedure item. Its lightweight surface and fast assimilation give a relieving and cooling sensation without taking off any sleek or sticky buildup. This product unlocked the power of long-lasting hydration without the hassle of layering multiple moisturizers. I'm continuing with gel cream for my everyday wear. The packaging is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with this Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. It's lightweight on my skin, easy to use, and doesn't leave a greasy feeling on the skin. I personally love using it at night on my face and neck after showering and patting my skin dry. It effortlessly absorbs into my skin, and I've noticed it feels smoother, and softer after a week. The pump is also very convenient to use and the container is refillable. I like to personally wipe the top off after every use gently with a dry cloth, and then I put the lid back on! All ready for my next use. Overall, I've had a great experience with this product.

reviews.review_title: Just like a splash of cool water
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a busy college student with dry, sensitive skin. This gel cream is so hydrating; the one thing I can compare it to is a splash of cool water on a hot summer's day. This gem not only quenches my skin's thirst but also leaves it looking gloriously dewy. Its gel-like texture feels as light as air yet delivers intense hydration that lasts all day, which is perfect for people who aren't huge fans of heavy products. It also contains niacinamide, which is perfect for you if you struggle with texture. Whether you're battling winter dryness or seeking a radiant glow, this cream gel is a must-have in your routine. Suitable for all skin types, its gentle formula without any fragrance will leave your skin feeling soft, supple, and utterly revitalized. Trust me, this moisturizer is a game-changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring gel cream is delightfully light, making it perfect for daily use. It effortlessly glides onto the skin, delivering instant hydration that quickly absorbs on my skin. What makes this gel cream different is its focus on restoring the skin barrier. I've noticed a remarkable improvement in my skin's overall texture. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and ceramides, it deeply nourishes and locks in moisture, leaving my skin feeling noticeably softer, smoother, and more supple. I appreciate Skinfix's commitment to clean, dermatologist-tested ingredients, making it suitable for my sensitive skin. I also appreciate this being fragrance free. This gel cream is versatile, seamlessly layering with other products in my routine. The packaging, is so practical with its pump dispenser, allowing for precise and hygienic application. My son has folliculitis and can't wait for him to try this since its formulation is so good for those using dermal medications or retinols.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to moisturizers, I am the queen of consistency. A gel cream is at the top of my list not only is it rehydrating it instantly kind of seeps into the skin, leaving a glassy kind of finish. It just feels so hydrating more than a thicker moisturizer that sits on top of your skin. This didn't leave my skin feeling tacky air dry done pretty quickly.  The pump style dispenser is not my favorite type of moisturizer component, but I do appreciate that this is refillable.   I quite like the texture, and there isn't really a cent which I appreciate.

reviews.review_title: A lightweight option great for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After working seven years in beauty retail, and as someone who has suffered from eczema on my face for most of my life, Iu2019ve tried my fair share of moisturizers over the years. I have to say that I have a new favorite brand with Skinfix! This product was fragrance free which I love, especially with u2018resetu2019 products that I use any time my skin is extra sensitive to help get it back to a healthy state.  This product is a gel moisturizer, meaning that it is more lightweight, and breathable option for people (especially if you are wondering about the difference between this product and the Triple Peptide Cream). In fact I would say that this should even work for people with acne, because it is so lightweight. People with oily skin also need moisture in their routine, and I think this is a fantastic option for people who deal with that (in fact I deal with acne on top of my dry skin and it worked well for me). I tend to have dry leaning skin, and this still left my skin feeling nice and hydrated, even though it was a lightweight option. I loved how easily it blends into my skin, and how there was no tugging sensation when rubbing it in.   Lastly I adored how hygienic the pump system is on this product. No dipping your fingers into a a jar and potentially contaminating the whole thing from bacteria thatu2019s underneath your finger nails with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! Iu2019m a 34 year old Beauty Enthusiast and Mother of 2 from Northen Kentucky! This Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring gel cream is a must have in your beauty routine! It is a lightweight gel cream that has long-lasting hydration for combination,oily and blemish prone skin! Has a blend of lightweight humectants like squalane, which helps to replenish the skin so your not losing your hydration! This gel cream helps to reduce (TEWL) transepidermal water loss! I love that it has no added fragrances or silicones! Itu2019s has B-L3 to help replenish lipids to make your skin barrier healthy! The niacinamide in it helps to smooth bump skin textures and skin tone ! Plus itu2019s very easy to use! You just press the pump 1 or 2 pumps and apply to clean skin on the face and neck in the morning and night! I love this gel cream!

reviews.review_title: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a licensed cosmetologist, my passion is hair. But sometimes I love trying new beauty items for myself and for my clients that ask for recommendations. reviews.review_text: This skin barrier restoring gel cream is incredible, it's lightweight but also provides immense amount of moisture and can noticeable difference in smoothness after using. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is sensitive and I have dry flaky patches.  I honestly didnu2019t consider it was a barrier issue.  That is, until I was introduced to this product.  This has me throwing out all of my failed attempts to healthier skin.   There is no fragrance in this product. It is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and doesnu2019t irritate my skin at all.  It is a little sticky at the beginning of drying. But, I promise it doesnu2019t stay.  It dries light as a feather and as soft as silk.  The only outcomes I have had are positive.  This cream absolutely deserves praise is its ability to restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.   I had been using a harsh cleanser/treatment for acne prior to starting this product.  My skin was so inflamed, red, and irritated from it.  Day one of using SkinFix barrier I noticed the inflammation and irritation disappearing.  With only a handful of days in, one pump in the morning and one pump at night, my skin has made a complete 180 to beautifully hydrated and calm skin.   I would absolutely recommend SkinFix to anyone who needs to restore and maintain their skins barrier.  For the price point, I feel like the cost is way less than the product is worth! I will now be saving money not having to guess and buy creams, gels, and lotions that leave me with no or short lived temporary results.    A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this gel cream moisturizer. I tend to go for creams but the gel texture is still very hydrating for my dry skin. I use this in the morning when I want a lighter moisturizer but still need hydration before I apply my sunscreen and makeup. I do like that you can just order refills to help it make it sustainable and a little more affordable. Overall itu2019s a solid choice for a moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: The Best Gel Cream I Have Ever Tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The skinfix barrier+ skin barrier restoring gel cream is light and creamy - a bit heavier than other gel creams that I have used in the past, but still significantly lighter than a full-weight face cream.  It went on very smoothly over all of the serums I use in my existing skincare regimen (whether it was glycolic acid, AHA/BHA, retinol, etc.), and it did not cause any pilling or peeling.  My face felt instantly hydrated and moist following application, and the feeling lasted through my work day.  Having said that, in the future, I would probably use this more in warmer months, as I wanted something more deeply nourishing in the dry air of winter (both the cold, blustery weather outside and the dry heat inside).  I think it was a fantastic gel cream; I just like to use something even more nourishing in this season.  Also, I love skincare that comes with a pump in the top!  The pump helps to distribute the appropriate amount of the gel cream and keeps the remaining product clean and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so amazed by this product! Ive been using it for days and the results are intense and replenishing. My skin was suffering from dryness. There was also a night in the shower that I believe the hot steam from the shower caused a flare up and was damaging to my skin barrier. I continued to use the skin fix gel cream and there are no signs of any damage to my barrier. I love that this product is vegan and cruelty free. The texture of the gel cream is so lightweight. Right after the application process  my skin absorbs the cream and my appearance is a glossy glow. I have never been able to achieve the skin glass look and my skin has never been so healthy. Skinfix gel cream has truly embraced both of my problems. The look and health status of my skin is top tier. The box detail is a perfect size and clear detail. The details provided are expectations , ingredients and skin nerd appealing information. I have the unique refill container. The container is a twist on seal and has a pump. Simply making it easy to use and keeping the product safe. Keeping the product safe and limiting outside access reduces the chance of cross contamination in any sort. This limits anything else possibly being put on your face other then the skinfix product. I absolutely love this feature as an esthetician and slight germaphobe. All around this product is five out of five. If there was a higher rating scale I would max my rating out, seriously this product works wonders. I would very highly recommend this gel cream to be used to fix any skin issue that needs fixing. Skin love and care was made in this gel cream by skinfix and I believe everybody needs this. New and improved my skin is thanking me tremendously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream may look like its brother, the Skinfix Barrier + triple lipid peptide cream, but itu2019s a completely different beast. This thick looking cream actually melts quite quickly once it touches your skin. It begins to take on a more watery texture that really makes it easy to spread and cover a large area with a thin layer of gel. I did notice that this formula made some of my more sensitive spots (my psoriasis and eczema affected areas) burn and sting. My guess is this formulation has some ingredients that help keep this gel cream, light and airy. In fact, itu2019s probably these ingredients that make this gel great for those prone to acne and excess oil. This gel cream wore on throughout the day and kept my skin really comfortable, but I would say it didnu2019t feel as indulgent or protective as I usually like for my 41-year-old skin. I could see this product being great for teens or 20 somethingu2019s just trying to maintain, nice clear healthy skin. in the future, I will probably skip this moisturizer for recommendation and instead recommend the triple lipid peptide cream for its  super indulgent nature.

This gel cream works well in all aspects and does not disappoint. I did not experience any breakouts or reactions to this cream which is awesome. Iu2019m fact, my skin is looking better after just one week of using this cream! I love that the packaging is eco friendly and refillable so I am not producing as much waste. I also love that this has a pump to dispense the amount you need and keep the rest of your cream germ free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lightweight texture of the gel cream makes it suitable for all skin types, especially oily and combination skin. It provides hydration without feeling heavy or greasy on my skin. I use tretinoin, and sometimes my skin barrier feels like it has been affected; skin peels are commonly what I see, and this gel cream has stopped my skin from peeling. I use the sandwiched tretinoin application and my skin is just loving the combination with Skinfix gel cream. It is the first thing I grab now after my toner. I love that it is flowy in texture, so I can use it with Gua sha and my other beauty tools. I love that it has niacinamide included, which minimizes pores and skin dullness. I recommend this to all skin types, especially oily skin it does not make you shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 35 years old, and I have dry skin with a fair tone. I'm investing in good skincare and less makeup, so trying out new beauty products is my new favorite hobby. This gel cream doesn't cause any irritation, burning eyes, or bad reactions. Another thing that I love is that it is refillable and comes with a pump applicator, making it easier to apply and preventing contamination of the product. After using it for 7 days, my skin is more hydrated, and it has strengthened the skin barrier. I'm also noticing that my skin looks healthier and feels plump, smooth, and radiant. Overall, I think this is an excellent product that gets the job done. I used this in conjunction with Skinfixu2019s Triple Lipid-Peptide Cream, and my skin has more than thanked me for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has quickly become an essential part of my skincare routine, and I can't sing its praises enough.  First and foremost, the lightweight nature of this gel cream is a true revelation. It effortlessly absorbs into the skin, leaving behind a refreshing and weightless feel. It's like a burst of hydration without the heaviness that can often accompany moisturizers. I adore the fact  that it doesn't feel like I've applied anything at all u2013 perfect for those who prefer a feather-light touch in their skincare regimen. The mild natural scent is a delightful bonus, providing a subtle and pleasant aroma without the overpowering presence of artificial fragrances. The absence of perfume is a godsend, particularly for those with sensitive skin like mine. It's refreshing to find a product that focuses on natural goodness rather than masking scents. As someone who battles with acne-prone skin, finding a moisturizer that strikes the right balance is crucial. The Skinfix Barrier+ Gel Cream has proven to be a game-changer. Not only does it hydrate effectively, but it also doesn't clog my pores or aggravate my acne-prone areas. Instead, it soothes and nourishes, leaving my skin feeling rejuvenated and resilient. What truly sets this gel cream apart is its impeccable performance as a barrier cream. Applying it before my makeup has become a non-negotiable step in my routine. It creates a smooth canvas for foundation, enhancing its application and ensuring it lasts throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream is the perfect alternative to the original Skinfix Triple Lipid Peptide cream. This one is perfect for those with oily, acne-prone, troubled, or irritated skin because it has a light, jelly consistency. The ingredients of this include the patented BL3 complex, which is composed of healthy fatty acids that help to improve the skin barrier. This also contains saccharide isomerate, which helps strengthen the skin barrier. Additionally, this has niacinamide to help even the skin tone, absorb excess oil, brighten the skin, and refine the appearance of pores. This also has zinc PCA which controls the sebum production of the skin and helps in reducing redness. Like the original triple lipid cream, this water-based cream comes in light green packaging and can dispense the product easily through its refillable container and pump. I like that this is nonscented, and does not add extra shine or heaviness to my already oily skin. I love using this every day, which gives enough hydration to my skin without the need for reapplication; however, for winter days, I prefer to use the original lipid peptide cream. I plan to use more of this product in the summer when my skin requires less heavy cream and less hydration. I find that this product layers well with my favorite cream and powder foundation and does not cause any interaction. This product helps not only in restoring my skin barrier health, but also prevents future breakouts and helps to fade acne scars due to the niacinamide and zinc ingredients. I also love that this seems to reduce the appearance of my pore size, and also seems to reduce the occurrence of blackheads and whiteheads, which has been a constant struggle with my skin. This is also a good daytime cream not only for those struggling with acne-prone skin, but also for those with sensitive skin. That is because this product is allergy-tested and is made to harmonize with the skin's natural pH. This is also non-comedogenic, vegan, and cruelty-free. I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a working professional in my late 30s from the midwest who is also a major beauty enthusiast that loves to try out amazing new beauty products! My skin type is dry with concerns of aging, hyperpigmentation, and dull sagging skin. This is my first time trying Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream which has been a great miracle, lightweight, richly hydrating gel face cream that works very well for all skin types especially for people with acne prone skin, large pores, sensitive, and super oily skin. This is a lightweight moisturizer but packed full of skincare science using ingredients like saccharide isomerate, niacinamide, heptapeptides and zinc PCA which nourish the skin barrier, help brighten skin tone, shrink appearance of pores, and absorb excess oil. The Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream felt so light on my skin with a gel texture but then quickly absorbed into my skin flawlessly! I mostly applied this face cream to face and neck after washing my face in the morning. I applied one to two pumps of the gel cream before applying face sunscreen, makeup, and other products. This face cream didnu2019t clog my pores or irritate my skin, and it left my face baby smooth with quenching hydration!  I loved that this cream didnu2019t have a strong fragrance or irritating strong scent! Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream is a cruelty and vegan face cream with clean ingredients made with no harsh ingredients free from parabens, phthalates, and petrolatum! This gentle face cream pairs wells with other products from Skinfix such as the 2% BHA Cleanser (for acne) and the Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads. I definitely recommend the Skinfix Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream especially for people who have a hard time finding a face moisturizer that wonu2019t flare their skin up or make their current skin condition worse such as acne while still hydrating skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this cream comes in such beautiful packaging with the easy to use airless pump that makes applying this gel cream hygienic. My combination to dry and mature skin could always use more hydration. I love that this is a very hydrating cream but without a heavy rich texture. I use this cream as the last step in my skincare routine after cleaning and toning my skin to lock in hydration. I apply a generous amount onto my skin and massage it gently into my skin. I tap over my skin with my fingertips until the gel cream is fully absorbed. This cream has a silky, smooth lightweight texture that absorbs rather quickly into my dry to combination skin without leaving my skin feeling sticky or greasy. It hydrates and soothes my combination to dry skin on application and it keeps my skin looking matte and clear by absorbing excess oil. This is a beautiful cream with long-lasting moisturizing and skin barrier support benefits that is perfect for my skin. I highly recommend this gel cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a younger female living in the Northeast and am mostly in colder/dryer weather with combination skin. Having a product that is vegan and does not have any harsh ingredients which can sometimes cause irritation to my face on top of the colder weather is also a benefit. I would recommend this product!

I would recommend this for 15-30 year olds as they tend to need moisturizer that is clean and non pore clogging.

The scent is very slight, however, that's not as important as how the product performs. I was in need of a product to deliver hydration without heaviness. I was quickly impressed by this soothing gel-cream. Lightweight, yet deeply hydrating and restorative for your skin barrier.Though it is suitable for most skin types, it consists of niacinamide and antimicrobial peptides, which make this product particularly good for those with either oily or acne-prone skin. After just an hour of use, my skin was visibly hydrated, less oily, and more refined. With continued use, my skin feels healthier and appears more radiant!
